sn56.131:4.1: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.131:4.2: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye pettivisayā cutā pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
sn56.131:4.6: Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ariyasaccassa.
sn56.131:5.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yogo karaṇīyo, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yogo karaṇīyo”ti.
sn56.131:6.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
